r.s: PEAR::HTML_Common is a base class for other HTML classes.
r.d: The PEAR::HTML_Common package provides methods for html code display and attributes handling. * Methods to set, remove, update html attributes. * Handles comments in HTML code. * Handles layout, tabs, line endings for nicer HTML code.
r.n: Migrate to package.xml version 2.0, use proper header comment block. No code changes since previous release.
